description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.expr: 100 * (sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"prd", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint) - sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"prd", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)) / sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"prd", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)

100 * (sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"dev-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint) - sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"dev-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)) / sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"dev-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)

100 * (sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"db-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint) - sum(node_filesystem_free_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"db-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)) / sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"^/($|mnt.*)", group=~"db-01", instance=~"$instance"}) by (instance, mountpoint)

title: [五感十築專案] 伺服器執行情況報表
